segments.text: I see the little boy reaching into the cookie jar; it’s almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but the risk is tangible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable that I can hardly stand to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman still polishing that plate, blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a disaster waiting to happen, but I want to see how it unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s expectant posture makes me smile; she’s so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t shake off this uneasy feeling in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but something holds me back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe I’m just a little too intrigued by their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water flowing over the sink adds to the chaos of the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
